Class MutableTransform

  • java.lang.Object
    • cinnamon.engine.object.MutableTransform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transform, Copier<Transform>, ObservablePosition<Transform>, ObservableRotation<Transform>, ObservableScale<Transform>, Position, Positionable, Rotatable, Rotation, Scalable, Scale

extends Object
implements Transform, Positionable, Scalable, Rotatable, Copier<Transform>
